name: Night Festival - DnD 5e
description:
The Night Festival holds a secret that not many know. 

A dark kept secret lies below.

Each year, the city of Wrale holds a festival to celebrate the city, its inhabitants, and the creators that have led to its success. The city is lit up with strings of colored lights, live music heard from all over, and at the city center delicacies and drinks available at every corner. For one night, the city is filled with dancing, laughter, and cheer as everyone comes together to celebrate. 

Except this year, people are going missing. Someone seen a few minutes earlier is no longer there, as if they disappeared into thin air. When a member of your party goes missing, you must find out what’s going on. 

Includes up to four encounters, one map, and multiple potential endings. This adventure is written to be accessible to all characters!

Includes a stylized and plain text pdf, both screenreader accessible.
